import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; // Import FontAwesomeIcon import { faSearch, faMapMarkerAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; // Import icons import "./Career.css"; // Import the CSS file import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Career = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Initialize useNavigate // Function to handle button click const handleLearnMore1Click = () => { navigate("/applyform"); // Navigate to the Portfolio page }; const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const [locationTerm, setLocationTerm] = useState(""); const [results, setResults] = useState([]); const [hasSearched, setHasSearched] = useState(false); // Track if a search has been performed const mockData = [ { title: "Senior Chef", location: "Delhi, India", id: "12345" }, { title: "Chef", location: "Banglore, India", id: "67890" }, { title: "Waiter", location: "Delhi, India", id: "11223" }, ]; const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setHasSearched(true); // Set hasSearched to true when the form is submitted const filteredResults = mockData.filter( (job) => job.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) && job.location.toLowerCase().includes(locationTerm.toLowerCase()) ); setResults(filteredResults); }; return ( <>

Because impact matters

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
setLocationTerm(e.target.value)} />

Recent Openings

{/* Benefits Card */}

Head Chef

We are seeking a talented and passionate Head Chef to lead our kitchen team and deliver an unforgettable dining experience.

# Job Id: 17286

# Date: May 2023

# Location: Delhi

{/* Culture Card */}

Chef

At Quik Chefs,We are looking for a skilled and passionate Chef to join our team and contribute to our culinary excellence.{" "}

# Job Id: 54637

# Date: May 2023

# Location: Bangalore

{/* Diversity and Inclusion Card */}

Waiter

We are looking for friendly, energetic, and customer-focused individuals to join our team as Waiters/Waitresses.

# Job Id: 45271

# Date: May 2023

# Location: Mumbai

{/* Life at Our Company Sections */}

Life at Our Company

{/* Card Container */}
{/* Benefits Card */}

Benefits

{" "} We encourage growth through hands-on experiences, expert-led workshops, and opportunities to refine both culinary and digital skills. Whether it’s mastering the latest plating techniques or developing interactive cooking tutorials, learning never stops at Quik Chefs.

{/* Culture Card */}

Culture

At Quik Chefs, we work together like a well-prepped kitchen—supportive, fast-paced, and always focused on excellence. From food bloggers to recipe developers and software engineers, every team member plays a crucial role in crafting a top-tier experience for our audience.

{/* Diversity and Inclusion Card */}

Diversity and Inclusion

Food has the power to bring people together. That’s why we are committed to sharing diverse cuisines, supporting sustainable food practices, and helping home cooks and professionals alike achieve culinary success.

{/* Flexible Work Card */}

Join Us

At Quik Chefs, we don’t just cook—we create experiences. If you’re passionate about food and technology, we’d love to have you on board. Let’s build something delicious together!

); }; export default Career;
